snippet: Mozart’s final opera, “La Clemenza di Tito,” being revived at the Met, has been subjected to harsh scrutiny. It turns out to be stranger and deeper than we have been told.
abstract: Metropolitan Opera revival of Mozart's La Clemenza di Tito demonstrates the appeal of an opera that is generally considered to be not very good.
lead_paragraph: Mozart’s final opera, “La Clemenza di Tito,” being revived at the Met, has been subjected to harsh scrutiny. It turns out to be stranger and deeper than we have been told.

headline.seo: Mozart’s Opera ‘Clemenza di Tito’ at the Met
headline.main: Enduring Appeal of Mozart’s Oddball Opera
headline.print_headline: Enduring Appeal of Mozart’s Oddball Opera
